sel.network.handler



class Handler;
Main handler with the purpose of starting children handlers, store constant informations and reload them when needed.

shared void reload();
Reloads the resources that can be reloaded. Those resources are the social json (always reloaded) and the web's pages (index, icon and info) when the http handler is running (when the server has been started with "web-enabled" equals to true).

shared void shutdown();
Closes the handlers and frees the resources.
